citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30am on
06-JUL-17.
A responsible individual was available for a physical inspection of the facility. Inspector called facility manager upon
arrival. Inspector spoke to an employee who did not have access to records and physical site.

ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.

arrival.  Inspector spoke to an employee who did not have access to records and physical site.
